title: Bug 4329 - No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are found. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. Additionally, the search should attempt to retrieve the Java element first. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name. NOTES:
OB: No results are found when searching via Package view selection and dialog.
EB: Search should display results when searched via Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the search dialog.
2. Select the Package view option.
3. Perform a search.
4. Note the lack of results.
5. Compare with search results when performing the search via the context menu in the packages view.

Expected behavior:
- The search should display results when searched via the Package view selection and dialog.
- The search should first attempt to retrieve the Java element.
- If retrieval fails, the search should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
